original_text: But his inwards and his legs shall he wash in water: and the priest shall burn all on the altar, to be a burnt sacrifice, an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the Lord.
korean_text: 그 내장과 정강이를 물로 씻을 것이요 제사장은 그 전부를 제단 위에서 불살라 번제를 드릴지니 이는 화제라 여호와께 향기로운 냄새니라

sentences.original_text: But his inwards and his legs
and the priest shall burn all on the altar,
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장은 제단 위 모든 것을 불사를 것이며

sentences.original_text: of a sweet savour unto the Lord.
